plurals.name: credentialManagementDeleteAllPasswordsDialogFirstInstructionNotSynced
plurals.item: Your password will be deleted from this device.
Your passwords will be deleted from this device.

plurals.name: credentialManagementDeleteAllPasswordsFirstInstructionSynced
plurals.item: Your password will be deleted from all synced devices.
Your passwords will be deleted from all synced devices.

plurals.name: credentialManagementDeleteAllPasswordsDialogConfirmationTitle
plurals.instruction: Placeholder is a number representing how many passwords will be deleted
plurals.item: Are you sure you want to delete this password?
Are you sure you want to delete %1$d passwords?

plurals.name: credentialManagementDeleteAllSecondInstruction
plurals.item: Make sure you still have a way to access your account.
Make sure you still have a way to access your accounts.
